TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PickEmbeddedChildHandler(object o, PickEmbeddedChildArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PickEmbeddedChildHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PickEmbeddedChildHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PickEmbeddedChildHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PickEmbeddedChildHandler is removed from the event.
